author: m.kalinin
content:
We're looking for input from CL client devs on the new Optimistic Sync tests format (built into consensus spec tests).
Here is the PR https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/2982

It would be great if one or two client teams implemented the basic test and provided the feedback on the format before we merge the PR and continue to write more tests. There are tarballs with tests attached to the PR.

Kudos to <@415109946682769408> for implementing the format support and the first test!
